member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Extensions.Analytics.AnalyticsExtension
member.summary: Extension methods to register required Analytic services into IServiceCollection

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Extensions.Analytics.AnalyticsExtension.AddGoogleAnalytics(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Registers required Google Analytic services into IServiceCollection
member.param: Google Tracking Id when provided will be called.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Extensions.Analytics.Google.IGoogleAnalyticsService
member.summary: Injectable service to handle Google analytics gtag.js.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Extensions.Analytics.Google.IGoogleAnalyticsService.TrackingId
member.summary: Google analytics uniquely Id which was used in method.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Extensions.Analytics.Google.IGoogleAnalyticsService.Initialize(System.String)
member.summary: Initialize Google analytics by registering gtag.js to the HTML document. Should be called once.
member.param: Is an identifier that uniquely identifies the target for hits, such as a Google Analytics property

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Extensions.Analytics.Google.IGoogleAnalyticsService.Config(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Allows you to add additional configuration information to targets. This is typically product-specific configuration for a product such as Google Ads or Google Analytics.
member.param: Is an identifier that uniquely identifies the target for hits, such as a Google Analytics property
Is one or more optional parameter-value pairs

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Extensions.Analytics.Google.IGoogleAnalyticsService.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to get various values from gtag.js including values set with the set command.
member.param: The name of the field to get.
Is an identifier that uniquely identifies the target for hits, such as a Google Analytics property

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Extensions.Analytics.Google.IGoogleAnalyticsService.Set(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Allows you to set values that persist across all the subsequent gtag() calls on the page.
member.param: Is a key name and the value that is to persist across gtag() calls.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Extensions.Analytics.Google.IGoogleAnalyticsService.Event(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Use the event command to send event data.
member.param: A recommended event or a custom event name.
Is one or more parameter-value pairs.
